alert.note: Alert for Otero (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 5:33PM MDT until August 08 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Otero County in south central New Mexico... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 531 PM MDT, Severe thunderstorm winds out ahead of a line of thunderstorms was moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alamogordo, Sunspot, High Rolls, Mountain Park, La Luz, Boles Acres, Karr Canyon and Oliver Lee State Park. This includes the following highways... Highway 70 in New Mexico near mile marker 212. Highway 54 in New Mexico between mile markers 52 and 64. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
